name: follow_user
description: Follow a user on X/Twitter by navigating to their profile.

steps.code: const followBtn = document.querySelector('[data-testid$="-follow"]'); const unfollowBtn = document.querySelector('[data-testid$="-unfollow"]'); if (unfollowBtn) return { already_following: true, message: 'Already following this user' }; if (followBtn) { followBtn.click(); return { success: true, message: 'Followed user' }; } return { success: false, message: 'Follow button not found' }
steps.name: result
steps.label: Follow user (skip if already following)
